title: Sanaa Lathan + Stephen James Interview and more
itunes:title: Sanaa Lathan + Stephen James Interview and more
description:
Monday 3/13 - Today on the show, for the first time ever, Sanaa Lathan and Stephan James came to promote their new show "Shots Fired". Also, after Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to Pamela Hudak for marrying a criminal, we opened up the phones to if our listeners think twice about getting into a relationship if their past is messy.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
